DrawingContext * getDrawingContext ()

Detailed Description

This class encapsulates an OpenGL ES drawer. It can supply a DrawingContext for MapLib.

Member Function Documentation

DrawingContext* WFAPI::IPhoneOpenGLESDrawer::getDrawingContext (  ) 

Returns a drawing context which can be used by MapLib to draw the maps.

void WFAPI::IPhoneOpenGLESDrawer::setScreenSize ( unsigned int  newWidth,
unsigned int  newHeight 
)

Changes the screen size of the map. The bottom left of the map will be fixed, and the top right corner will change according to the new size.

Parameters:
newWidth The new width for the map, in pixels.
newHeight The new height for the map, in pixels.

GLuint  viewFrameBuffer,
EAGLContext *  eaglContext 
)

Sets the internal frame buffers that the drawer uses.
